name: Island Isolation
description:
Island Isolation
Is a small game about a planet that consists of a few islands which are connectet trough water ways. Sadly every Island can only support one industry and so all the islands have to work together in order to prosper and reach their ultimate goal.

GamePlay
Develop the islands in a strategic way so that all thier neigbors can prosper with it.
Use the radial manu of each island in order to change the industrial focus of an island.
Trade will hapen automatically so make sure to provide enogh ships to keep your economy going.

How to play
Start up the game and wait for the world to generate. Hit start to start or the

dynamite 

in the lower right corner to get a new world.
Leftclick on an island to open its overview. Rightclick an island to build on it.
Survive as long as you can and try to build a Paradise that costs 50 of all posible materials you can produce.

And most importantly "Have Fun".
Fullscreen is adviced as the UI for some reason wont behave correctly ;)

The materials you use

Food is the most important base material without it your island die

Wood is the 2nd base material and used a lot and to build more ships

Stone the 3rd base material needed nearly eveywhere

Metal is one of the 4 base materials and needed a lot

Parts are needed for intermediat production

Bateries are used to power stuff

Electronics are an advanced material

Medicine increases mood and thus productivity
Research is needed for Sience

Rocketry is used to do advanced Sience

Entertainment increases productivity

Your Goal
Most importantly survive.

This is what you are trying to build in the end
